thread.title: Top tours in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor.com
thread.title_full: Top tours in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor.com

title: Top tours in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor.com
text:
Travel Top tours in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor.com 
Looking for a little guidance on that next excursion? A guided tour may be just what you need. According to TripAdvisor.com, these are the best tours in the country, given their education and entertainment cachet. Wild Horse Adventure Tours nails No. 1 spot. 
Top tours in the U.S., according to TripAdvisor.com ( http://tinyurl.com/pdj3p9b ): 
1. Wild Horse Adventure Tours, Corolla, N.C. 
2. Real New York Tours, New York 
3. Platypus Wine Tours, Napa, Calif. 
4. Pink Jeep Tours Sedona, Sedona, Ariz. 
5. Trilogy Excursions, Lahaina, Hawaii 
6. Grand Adventures Tours, Las Vegas 
7. Savor Seattle Food Tours, Seattle 
8. Electric Tour Company Segway Tours, San Francisco 
9. Chicago's First Lady Official Chicago Architecture Foundation River Cruise, Chicago 
10. Wild Willy's Airboat Tours, St. Cloud, Fla.
